title.rendered: ARTICLE: “What are the keys for brokers to scale their business in 2023?” [CANADIAN MORTGAGE PROFESSIONAL, JANUARY 2023]

content.rendered:
The expert insight you need for a successful year ahead. Fergal McAlinden, of Canadian Mortgage Professional, spoke with Hugo Dos Reis, PFP from Vine Group Mortgage Alliance about scaling business in an uncertain climate in 2023.

Full article linked here.

Article Preview:

excerpt.rendered: The expert insight you need for a successful year ahead. Fergal McAlinden, of Canadian Mortgage Professional, spoke with Hugo Dos Reis, PFP from Vine Group Mortgage Alliance about scaling business in an uncertain climate in 2023.
